required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 09, 2023
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Phase Ⅰ Clinical Trial of a Candidate COVID-19 Vaccine
clinical_study.official_title: A Single-arm, Open-label Phase I Clinical Study to Evaluate the Safety, Tolerability and Immunogenicity of Recombinant COVID-19 Vaccine (Adenovirus Vector) for Inhalation in People 21 to 65 Years Old (Previously Primed With Authorized Vaccines)

brief_summary.textblock: In this trial, a single-arm, open-label study design will be used to evaluate the safety and tolerability after vaccination with escalating doses of the investigational vaccine (Recombinant COVID-19 Vaccine (chimpanzee adenovirus vector) for Inhalation, RCVi) at low, medium, and high doses in healthy adults (previously primed with authorized vaccines).

primary_outcome.measure: Safety in terms of adverse events
primary_outcome.description: Number of Participants with any local and systemic Adverse Events (AEs)

primary_outcome.measure: Safety in terms of solicited AEs
primary_outcome.description: Number of Participants with solicited AEs

primary_outcome.measure: Safety in terms of unsolicited AEs
primary_outcome.description: Number of Participants with unsolicited AEs

primary_outcome.measure: Safety in terms of laboratory-based AEs
primary_outcome.description: Changes in laboratory test indicators of clinical significance after vaccination as compared with those before vaccination

primary_outcome.measure: Safety in terms of MAAEs and AESIs
primary_outcome.description: Incidence of all Medical Attended Adverse Events (MAAEs) requiring medical attention and Adverse Events of Special Interest (AESIs)

secondary_outcome.measure: Immunogenicity in terms of Humoral immune response by ELISA
secondary_outcome.description: GMT of S protein specific antibody by ELISA
GMT, seroconversion rate and GMFI of neutralizing antibody (NAb) response

secondary_outcome.measure: Immunogencity in terms of Cellular immune response
secondary_outcome.description: Intracellular cytokine levels (ICS) in T lymphocytes

secondary_outcome.measure: Immunogencity in terms of Mucosal immune response
secondary_outcome.description: Anti-SARS-CoV-2 S protein mucosal IgA antibodies

arm_group.description: 21~65 year old healthy subjects, received low dose of RCVi
21~65 year old healthy subjects, received medium dose of RCVi
21~65 year old healthy subjects, received high dose of RCVi

intervention.intervention_name: Recombinant COVID-19 Vaccine (chimpanzee adenovirus vector) for Inhalation
